title: Technology-Based Customized Mathematics Learning Design: Strengthening Managerial Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and LMS (Learning Management System) usage experience
context.additional_context: Emphasizing mobile-based informal learning experiences in BYOD environments, with demands for localization and personalization of learning content.

learning_goals: Learners can select contextually appropriate just-in-time learning materials using mobile devices with over 80% accuracy when solving math problems.
Learners can redesign digital content provided by a SaaS-based platform to develop customized learning modules applicable to work scenarios at least three times.
Learners can track their math learning progress and diagnose individual learning gaps at least twice using LMS analytics tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
